parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the shown right text in the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbTextRight''' [idc, index]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbTextRight''' index

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_text = [[lbTextRight]] [101, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_text = _control [[lbTextRight]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>
